title: Dangerous Affairs
description: Sarah had it all. A new job. Soon to be married to the love of her life. But that would all change in a blink of an eye. And she is left with no idea on how to move on.All she wanted was to start a new chapter in her life, but the moment she meets Logan things change in a different direction. The hidden truths that they both try to avoid are revealed and that is when everything tuns into a real nightmare.
author: Claribel Fischer
